Half-Life 2 a všechny jeho pokračování vřele doporučuji.
HL se stal mou nejoblíbenější hrou nejen pro příběh, interakci s prostředím, gameplayem ale i dokonalým soundtrackem. Občas jsem sice měl potíže s postupem dál kvůli nějaké prkotině, kterou jsem přehlédl ale vždy jsem ji po nějaké době našel. Hra je od Valve na které mám vlastní názor ohledně kvality ale HL je ještě z dob, kdy vydávali dokonalé hry a necpali do nich strašné updaty. Série Half-Life je legendou mezi hrama a taky i zůstane. 
                                                                   (Hodnocení:  9/10)                                
 
                                                                                                                                            PS: Prosím o vydání Half-Life 3

so i played the mighty half life 2. here is my review of this (mighty) game.

the good.
gunplay+
soundtrack+
graphics on high+

the bad imo.

story is average at best-
sometimes in the later city17 levels you get lost-
voice acting is average at best-
the game is downright frustrating sometimes-

the game might of been the best game ever made back when it was made.But many years later there have been better games out there that do gameplay better,story better,soundtrack better etc.so saying this game is still better then most new shooters is kinda false imo.If it's the best game ever made to you in you'r opinion then  this review won't change that. so for the love of god stop pushing half life 2 as the best game ever made in my face or any other that disagree's with you'r opinion. 6.5/10

[h1]"Вы готовы, мистер Фриман?"[/h1]

Что тут говорить - это великая Half-Life! Сюда нельзя применить какие либо современные критерии компьютерной игры, так как эта серия сама являлась первичным мерилом, с которым сравнивали многие компьютерные игры жанра. Это классика, как Шопен, Бах, Шнитке - в это будут играть, обсуждать, рассказывать и ждать продолжения.
one of the best games ever made, it's a shame the beta version wasnt final though

Half-Life 3 doesn't exist
https://youtu.be/urza2sbU68Q

It's Half-Life 2. 
You're on Steam. 
If this isn't in your library, you're doing it wrong. 
Should go without saying this is another "I fucking love this game" badge winner. 

Reasons to buy and play this game: 

- It easily makes lists of one of the best games ever made. Set the bar for FPS for a generation or two. Often feels like Matrix-type action. 

- Update: There are a lot of great mods... the original Substance v0.84 is a diehard favorite for me, I always try to emulate the feel that weapon-set gave...but there are many great alternatives I discuss below. 'Synergy' is a good favorite option lately. 

- Lots of fun and amusing moments, good storytelling through a game. The level design and puzzles are really great. 

- Half Life 2: Update is a free mod/update for the game that works really well and has all the achievements and it really does make the graphics look a good deal better, AI seems smoother too sometimes, definitely improves the experience, making the game more immersive, and suspension of disbelief alot more tolerable, improving the story and gameplay. The lighting and reflections are great and much more realistic. 

- Deathmatch Tactical 1.2 is an awesome frigin' mod with the best substance weapons, and bullet time, it's freaking great, you can switch between tactical and substance modes, spawn all the weapons/ammo without using impulse_101, spawn extra enemies, sniper and crossbow have scopes, and the combine and blood effects look awesome. 

- Garry's Mod automatically loads Half-Life 2 maps if you have HL2 installed, so you can play through the entire campaign co-op, or with a portal gun, custom weapons, etc. etc. to your hearts content. 

- Cinematic Mod is another awesome mod, and all these mods have their own shortcuts by the way, meaning you can have all these versions of the game to play whenever you want and they wont interfere with each other. Cinematic mod also upgrades the graphics and changes the way the weapons look and act in some cool ways. Deathmatch Tactical and CM both have aiming down the sights for example. CM enables many changes that you can customize, including harder difficulty (always lethal headshots). 

- All the HL2 games and Black Mesa have good soundtracks and great memorable gameplay moments that are epic to behold the first time and subsequent times after. 

I definitely recommend this game. If you've never seen, heard of, or played this game, buy it and play it now!!! And I would recommend playing Half Life 2: Update!

I hope my review helped inform and give ideas to others as to the best ways to experience this game of legends.

One of my top 3 fps games.  

Great atmosphere,  great story and characters.

1)Сюжет. В Half-Life сюжет потрясающий. Антиутопия передана изумительна. Людям не дают размножаться, за тобой следят мэнхэки, повсюду ходят солдаты альянса. И это всё отлично передает атмосферу.
2)Геймплэй. На выбор тебе предоставляется 10 видов оружий. И этого вполне хватает. Процесс стрельбы тебе доставляет удовольствие. Противники разнообразные: Страйдеры, мэнхэки, муравьиные львы, комбайны ( разных видов ), зомби ( тоже разных видов ), хэдкрабы и др. 
3)Графика. Для тех лет шедевральная, а сейчас в принце нормальная.

好玩！经典！确实不负在多年以后一提半条命要出续作就议论纷纷的盛况（虽然G胖不会数三来着）！恐怖气氛很到位，重力枪等由物理引擎带来的探索创新元素也非常棒！不过美中不足的是由于是老游戏的原因有一些BUG例如油桶难以立起来或者不小心跳到奇怪的地方时停留较长时间自动存档导致之后在脱出后不小心死亡又卡进去无限循环（自动存档之前一个存档在很前面就会很尴尬了）。
本人虽然说好玩，但是实际已经被蚁狮吓到不敢玩游戏了呢【抖抖抖】
胆子大的朋友们可以考虑玩一玩，不然也可以买个留作纪念吧

HALF LIFE 2
Desenvolvido pela VALVE e lançado em novembro de 2004, Half Life 2 é um game de ação e sobrevivência, lançado para PC, XBOX, XBOX 360 e PS3.

No primeiro game, você descobre que a Black Mesa, um laboratório de pesquisas localizado no Novo México (EUA), fazia pesquisas com portais dimensionais que os levaram a descobrir um plano de existência de uma ou mais dimensões chamado Xen.Após o incidente nos laboratórios da Black Mesa, vários monstros da fauna de Xen são trazidos para a nossa dimensão (não fica bem claro se os monstros são apenas da dimensão Xen ou de outras dimensões).

Ainda em no primeiro game você descobre que os efeitos do incidente nos laboratórios da Black Mesa se estendeu por todo o planeta, levando a humanidade ao caos.
O planeta esta dominada por varias criaturas de outras dimensões, os únicos lugares seguros são as cidades controladas pelos Combine ou as bases da resistência humana que lutam contra os Combine.

Sua missão é ajudar a resistencia a vencer os Combine e salvar a humanidade.

Mais informações em: http://artificiosequencial.blogspot.com.br/2015/05/the-one-free-man.html

One of the greatest tech demos ever made 10/10

But seriously, this game was revolutionary on its release and I still feel like nothing else has come close to it over a decade later. For those that missed this when it first came out, Half-Life 2 is basically why we have realistic physics, facial expressions, environmental lighting, and 3D sound. They pioneered so many different technological breakthroughs and set the bar for what all video games, let alone FPS's, could be. 

Not only is it the technological marvel of its time but it is also unrivaled in terms of gameplay. There is so much variety that seamlessly integrates with what you are doing in the story. It's hard to even know where to begin when talking about how great the gameplay is. One minute you're committing ant-lion genocide and the next you are commanding them to slay anything that isn't you. You could be solving a slow meticulous puzzle one second and then suddenly have to deal with a wave of man-hacks. All this variety, cohesion, and suspense make for a truly gripping experience that is impossible to put down. 

If I had to have a complaint it would be that a lot of the story is a mystery until you dig deeper into the lore of Half-Life. "What are these combine things I'm killing and why do they look like humans if they are aliens???" are questions I had so I know other people have had them as well. There are logical explanations for everything but most of it is merely hinted at in the game. Some very important details about the game such as the 'Seven Hour War' are footnotes in the game that could easily be missed by an unexplorative player. Even someone like me that's played the game countless times had to look up videos explaining very basic things about the games story. This is more of a nitpick than a deal breaker but it's the one flaw I feel the game has. 

Some highlights of the game are the way it feels extremely vast. Escaping from City 17 and driving miles away only to return later felt right. It felt like I took the long road and I had to work to get where I went. It felt like I had left the City and moved a long way away to the outskirts of town and when I came back to City 17 via detour it still felt just as believable. This is one of the games greatest strengths. Its sheer size is massive and yet the scale is so believable because you feel so immersed in the game. I feel like my life is in danger when I'm several hundred feet up in the air on a wobbly bridge because if I fall off I fall a very long way before going splat. I feel like I just drove many miles out of the way because I did. I wasn't magically teleported anywhere (*cough*...you know what I mean). If I ended up some place, it's because I fought tooth and nail to get where I was. This makes the game feel extremely real in ways that most games don't. Add that to the fact that there are no cutscenes that break this immersion and you have yourself a hell of an intense experience. 

This game has truly stood the test of time. It still feels fresh and fun so many years later and doesn't seem nearly as dated as its (amazing) predecessor. There are few games that I can just sit down and play nonstop without loosing interest. It's very rare that a game will glue me to the edge of my chair the way HL2 does. This is why I consider it to be one of the greatest video games of all time...even if you have no clue what just happened after you beat it.

Ah ah, o Half-Life yok mu o Half-Life. Ömrümüzü internet kafelerde geçirmemize sebep olan o oyun. Efsaneler efsanesi, bilim kurgu oyunlarının babası, Türkiye'nin 2000 ve 2006 yılları arasındaki bitki örtüsü, dilden dile dolaşan Valve yapımı bir şaheser. Oyunun kısaca hikayesinden bahsedecek olursam yönettiğimiz bilim adamının adı ilk oyunda da olduğu gibi Gordon Freeman. (Dr. Gordon Freeman diye de karşımıza çıkar) Oyunun çoğunluğu Doğu Avrupa'daki City 17'de (Şehir-17) geçiyor. Oyunun konusu ise Combine adlı imparatorluğun (çoğunlukla uzaylı robotlardan oluşan bir çeşit antagonist güç) dünyayı ele geçirip insanları köleleştirmesidir. Oyunun hikayesi ise ilk oyunun hikayesinden 20 yıl sonrasını konu almaktadır. Oyun trende G-Man'in bizi uyandırıp ''Sana ihtiyacımız var'' demesiyle başlıyor. Neyse bu kadar konuşma yeter sizi sıkmayayım. Oyunu ve hikayesini zaten bilmeyeniniz yoktur. Oyunun eksi ve artılarını sıralayacak olursak

Artıları

+ Olağanüstü grafikler
+ Gözlerinizi alamayacağınız atmosfer
+ Sürükleyici ve akıcı hikaye
+ Sizi bıktırmayan, usandırmayan görevler
+ Muhteşem optimizasyon ve grafik motoru

Daha söylemediğim o kadar çok şey var ki size anlatamam.

Eksileri

- Bu oyunun eksisi falan yok!

Neyse bu kadar konuşma yeter sizi sıkmayayım. Size bu oyunu şiddetle tavsiye ediyorum.

This game has one of the most compelling and in-depth storylines of any game I've played. (and I've played a lot) There are so many cool things you can do using the game's physics, and the gameplay makes good use of them. It's fun and well worth a play. I've completed the game a couple times before, but it is still worth another playthrough. It's an awesome game.
More than a decade later, I still say this is the best PC game ever made.

Очень впечатлительная игра, в которую можно играть на протяжении десяти лет, после выхода. Интересный, научно-апокалитический сценарий, где на грани выживания находится всё человечество. С центром обороны в восточной европы. С характерным, для этих мест, пейзажем, чем-то, отдалённо, напоминающем атмосферу в мире S.T.A.L.K.E.R., с добавлением инопланетных существ. А музыкльное сопровождение, просто дух заводит, заставляет переживать, бороться.
